name: Advanced Business Communications: Power, Persuasion, and Problem-solving

prereqs.text: ((70-340 [] at least D) and (70-345 [] at least D)) or (73-270 [] at least D)

long_desc: Challenges such as communicating leadership and expertise to a newly formed team, receiving unclear expectations, limited time to complete a complex problem, persuading a reluctant colleague, showcasing yourself in a crucial performance review all occur in business. This advanced course digs deeper into how leaders and successful professionals navigate the complex workplace of surprise, ambiguity, crisis, and diversity. Youll explore varied, often highstakes workplace scenarios to build your persuasive ability, linguistic skill, communicative flexibility, agility, and confidence.
